snippet.title: Journey To Monolith - Trailer
snippet.description:
Journey to Monolith is a strategic, turn-based roguelite game releasing in 2024. Choose a general to lead your team, recruit fighters from six unique regions, and customize your fighters' stats and abilities with powerful spells.

Wishlist now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2730290/Journey_to_Monolith/

Play the demo!
https://journeytomonolith.com/
https://drewstillwell.itch.io/journey-to-monolith

Join our discord!
https://discord.com/invite/MsS2m4t8Hp
